distillations.title: Project Perplex - The Multi-Agent Collaboration Paradigm
distillations.description: Long-form distillation of perplex repository revealing AI-agent collaboration infrastructure patterns and paradigm shifts from 'AI as tool' to 'AI as team member'

Inferred Context: User interest in collaboration dynamics + all Wisdom Ladder levels selected indicates desire for conceptual abstraction of coordination patterns rather than feature documentation.

backlog.title: Strategic Shift: From 'AI as Enhanced Automation' â†’ 'AI as Team Member'
backlog.description: Strategic paradigm shift proposal to treat AI agents as team members with cognitive limitations, requiring coordination infrastructure rather than just documentation.
backlog.strategic_context: Perplex repository analysis revealed that multi-agent AI collaboration requires infrastructure (identity management, workspace boundaries, enforcement automation) similar to distributed human teams. Current paradigm of treating AI as stateless tools fails under cognitive load.
